title: World
description: Defines a self-contained, instantiable game world or map.

id.description: Required. The unique, namespaced ID for this world (e.g., 'core:main_campaign', 'my_mod:horde_arena').

name.description: Required. The human-readable name of the world for display.

description.description: A brief description of the world.

instances.description: A list of all entity instances to be created when the world is initialized.
